description:
I'm a web developer, music-lover, average surfer, and tall person.

Currently, I spend my days making cool stuff as a developer at Bean. I'm mostly into building sites using modern Javascript Frameworks like Vue.js and React. Before coding full-time I worked in the music industry for over a decade as an audio engineer, mixer & producer. I live with my wife, daughter, and pup in Los Angeles.
fine_print: This blog was created using Forestry & Gridsome
